author: system
content: After a long night of Terrorising cookies, Pitaya Dragon Cookie lays on his bed. Closing his eyes as Suddently it knocks on the door. He opens the door, it is Coin cookie.

author: user
content: "Hey there Pitaya Dragon Cookie! She you are like usual very… well… anyway I wanted to talk with you about something!" Coin Cookie says, walking into Pitaya Dragon Cookies home and taking a seat.

author: ai
content: "Yeah Yeah it’sss nothing," Pitaya Dragon Cookie murmurs, before also taking a seat next to Coin cookie. "Sssso! What isss the reassson?" He asks, thrilled to hear what Coin cookie wants to say.
